docs.snippet: Barcelona sporting director Andoni Zubizarreta has praised Luis Suarez for "acknowledging his mistake" after the Uruguay forward bit Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini at the World Cup finals.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona sporting director Andoni Zubizarreta has praised Luis Suarez for "acknowledging his mistake" after the Uruguay forward bit Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini at the World Cup finals.

docs.snippet: Juventus defender Andrea Barzagli, a World Cup winner with Italy in Germany in 2006, will be sidelined for three months after undergoing surgery on his Achilles tendon and ankle.
docs.lead_paragraph: Juventus defender Andrea Barzagli, a World Cup winner with Italy in Germany in 2006, will be sidelined for three months after undergoing surgery on his Achilles tendon and ankle.

headline.main: World Cup Defender Barzagli to Miss Start of Juve's Season
headline.print_headline: World Cup Defender Barzagli to Miss Start of Juve's Season

docs.snippet: On July 2 in World Cup history: Colombia defender Andres Escobar killed in Medellin, Colombia, after returning home from 1994 World Cup. Luis Suarez's hand ball helps Uruguay beat Ghana in Johannesburg in 2010.
docs.lead_paragraph: On July 2 in World Cup history: Colombia defender Andres Escobar killed in Medellin, Colombia, after returning home from 1994 World Cup. Luis Suarez's hand ball helps Uruguay beat Ghana in Johannesburg in 2010.

headline.main: ON THIS DAY: Escobar Shot Dead on Return Home
headline.print_headline: ON THIS DAY: Escobar Shot Dead on Return Home

docs.snippet: The Colombian has surprised even professional observers with his play and his adaptability.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Colombian has surprised even professional observers with his play and his adaptability.

headline.main: James Rodríguez Might Be a Perfect No. 10
headline.print_headline: James Rodríguez Might Be a Perfect '10'

docs.snippet: Tens of thousands of Argentine fans were not disappointed when a goal by Ángel di María sent Argentina past Switzerland and into the World Cup quarterfinals.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Brazil Brings Out Best in Argentina Fans

docs.snippet: Barcelona and Liverpool held 'productive' talks in London on Wednesday over the possible transfer of disgraced Anfield striker Luis Suarez but no deal was finalised, British media reported.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona and Liverpool held 'productive' talks in London on Wednesday over the possible transfer of disgraced Anfield striker Luis Suarez but no deal was finalised, British media reported.

headline.main: Barcelona, Liverpool Hold 'Productive' Talks on Suarez
headline.print_headline: Barcelona, Liverpool Hold 'Productive' Talks on Suarez

docs.snippet: Barcelona are in the market for "a forward and defenders", president Josep Bartomeu said on Wednesday, as the club look to rebuild after ending last season without major silverware for the first time in six years.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona are in the market for "a forward and defenders", president Josep Bartomeu said on Wednesday, as the club look to rebuild after ending last season without major silverware for the first time in six years.

headline.main: Barca Looking to Buy 'Forward and Defenders'-President
headline.print_headline: Barca Looking to Buy 'Forward and Defenders'-President

docs.snippet: Brazil and Colombia enter the World Cup quarterfinals with totally different mindsets.

docs.snippet: Argentina thanked their lucky stars and the "post of God" for scraping into the World Cup quarter-finals and began preparing on Wednesday for a weekend clash with Belgium.

headline.main: Argentina Thank 'Post of God', Prepare for Belgium
headline.print_headline: Argentina Thank 'Post of God', Prepare for Belgium

docs.snippet: Racing towards the camera after scoring direct from a corner at Colombia's top youth tournament in 2004, excited scouts could see James Rodriguez was a kid at ease in the limelight.
